ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: My understanding of counterpoint, harmony, and form was developed. I now see how counterpoint developed from the Renaissance to the classical era, and I understand how harmony emerges from counterpoint.
Counterpoint in many different situations, form and harmony
How to compose different species of counterpoint and how to analyze the structure of music from a harmonic and contrapuntal perspective.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The assignments are laid out on a set schedule for the whole course, and we receive regular, thorough feedback on each assignment. However, the last few assignments covered topics that were not covered in lecture until later.
Good professor, only downside is sometimes homework covered content we had not yet learned in class.

Strengths: Professor and TF are accessible and helpful.
Weakness: significant workload, especially for students who have no composition background or experience before taking the class; material moves very quickly

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: I think this course is essential for anyone wishing to learn classical music theory. It is especially relevant for anyone interested in theory or composition.

I would only recommend this course to students who have interest or experience in composition and are willing to invest a substantial amount of time into doing work for the class. Do not take this class if you are looking for an easy way to fulfill private lesson music theory co-requisites.
